QMARK-TECHNOLABS-DEV/SP_medifort_admin_s.summary: Recent activities in the repository include multiple push and pull requests, focusing on features such as login functionality, doctor card updates, banner management, and gallery CRUD operations. These updates have been worked on over the past few weeks, with significant progress made in UI optimization, video integration, and health talk API implementations.

Manu-Madhu/Bristro_Salads.summary: The repository has seen updates to the home content, subscription plan, and image optimizations over the past couple of weeks. These activities suggest ongoing maintenance and refinement of the platform's user interface and user experience, aiming for enhanced engagement and visual appeal.

akashmn/Velammal_Hospital_Frontend.summary: Activity in this repository includes a push event that merged pull requests related to UI bug fixes and completion of the UI, indicating efforts to stabilize and finalize the frontend of the hospital's application, ensuring a smooth user experience and resolving outstanding interface issues.

profile_summary:
Manu M is a highly skilled Full Stack Developer with a strong foundation in programming languages such as JavaScript, TypeScript, and C++. With a professional network of 14 followers and a portfolio of 49 public repositories, Manu has established himself as a credible and influential figure in the development community. His technical expertise and collaborative approach enable him to design and deliver high-quality software solutions that meet the needs of clients and users alike. As a seasoned developer, Manu possesses a unique ability to bridge the gap between front-end and back-end development, making him a valuable asset to any project or organization.

Manu's expertise in JavaScript, TypeScript, and C++ has allowed him to develop a wide range of applications and systems, from web and mobile applications to complex software systems. With a focus on innovation and reliability, Manu is committed to staying at the forefront of industry trends and best practices, ensuring that his skills and knowledge remain up-to-date and relevant. As a result, Manu is well-equipped to drive technical projects forward, leveraging his technical prowess and collaborative spirit to deliver exceptional results and exceed client expectations. With his strong technical foundation and dedication to excellence, Manu is an ideal partner for businesses and organizations seeking to develop cutting-edge software solutions.
